metadata.name: ERC1155 Placehodler
metadata.description:
This is a placeholder token for my "Ed Pas Editions" ERC1155 contract. 

I made the image in Adobe Illustrator on January 1, 2023 and rasterized it at 4000 x 4000 pixels. It is a modified version of an image I created in December 2022 as part of a series of seraphim.

This is my editions genesis on the Ethereum network and was minted to meet a deadline for contracts to maintain eligibility for OpenSea royalties without blocking zero-royalty marketplaces.

There is a non-zero chance that I will update the image and metadata at some point.
